values.headline: We believe in
values.goals: We strive to be the number one trustworthy informational site about corona and the reopening of educational institutions.

guidelines.title: Guidelines
guidelines.intro: You can reduce your chances of being infected or spreading COVID-19 by taking some simple precautions:

guide1.title: 1. Wash your hands
guide1.context1: Wash your hands, always with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. It is good to also regularly use hand sanitizer when not being able to wash your hands.

context3.li2: before, during and after you prepare food

guide2.title: 2. Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth
guide2.context1: Hands touch many surfaces and can pick up viruses.
guide2.context2: Once contaminated, hands can transfer the virus to your eyes, nose or mouth. From there, the virus can enter your body and infect you.

guide3.title: 3. Maintain social distancing
guide3.context1: Maintain at least 1 metre distance yourself and others.
guide3.context2: When someone coughs, sneezes, or speaks they spray small liquid droplets from their nose or mouth which may contain virus.
